title: Medical Microbiology
description: Advanced study of bacteria, protozoa, fungi, and viruses that cause human diseases; emphasis on epidemiology, mechanisms of disease causation, prevention, and treatment.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 3380 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3380 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
